title: Google Assistant for the Galaxy Watch 4 is still ‘months’ away
content:
Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 4 made the switch over to Wear OS, but it remained an experience that was clearly Samsung’s more than Google’s. Now, Samsung is providing an update on Google Assistant for the Galaxy Watch 4, saying that the promised feature is still “months” away from its debut.

more…

The post Google Assistant for the Galaxy Watch 4 is still ‘months’ away appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Assistant is confirmed to be coming to the Galaxy Watch 4 series, but even now it is still "months" away from launch.
